articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as England host defending champions Ireland at Twickenham in the Six Nations.
articles.title: Six Nations: England v title-chasing Ireland - build-up

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Manchester United host Everton in the Premier League, plus watch Football Focus.
articles.title: Premier League: Man Utd v Everton - team news & build-up

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra online-only commentary from the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian GP: Bearman set to become youngest Briton to race in F1

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC radio commentary as Italy host Scotland at the Stadio Olimpico in Rome in the Six Nations.
articles.title: Six Nations 2024: Italy host Scotland in Rome

articles.description: Italy hold on to secure their first Six Nations home win since 2013 as Scotland's title hopes are ended by a second-half collapse in Rome.
articles.title: Italy end Scots' title hopes with long-awaited win

articles.description: England's tour of India ends in a crushing defeat by an innings and 64 runs inside three days in the fifth Test in Dharamsala.
articles.title: Woeful England surrender in final India Test

articles.description: Two first-half penalties set Manchester United on their way to an unconvincing victory over Everton at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Garnacho wins two first-half penalties as Man Utd beat Everton

articles.description: Watch on BBC One Scotland, listen to Radio Scotland and follow live text coverage as Aberdeen host Kilmarnock in the Scottish Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Scottish Cup quarter-final: struggling Aberdeen host Kilmarnock

articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Cardiff City face Ipswich Town, followed by eight other fixtures in the Championship.
articles.title: Championship: Cardiff level with Ipswich in first of nine games

articles.description: Anthony Joshua rediscovers his swagger with a destructive win over Francis Ngannou as British rival Tyson Fury watches on.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Francis Ngannou: Briton rediscovers swagger as rival Tyson Fury watches on
